title: The Asset Allocator: DIY Disasters Are Avoidable
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: The huge and rapid across-the-board gains of the current market make now the most relevant time to remind investors of the protective value of asset allocation. This podcast (5:46) argues that we should reduce risk and aspire to steady returns. While we cannot predict the future — indeed, because we cannot predict the future — we should plan our finances in such a way as to avoid calamitous outcomes. Learn more about your ad choices.
